body: Which smart object for project 1  Tell me which smart object you are going to work on. Smart shower  Smart shopping cart  Smart water bottle Smart toilet Smart flower pot / garden

A link to your github repository where your code is hosted A compressed zip drive containing everything I need to run your code under local host Note- if your code is designed to run within your existing page- please make note of this in the submission, and I will test it there.

A link to your documentation and design sketches.These should be presented on your publicly accessible portfolio page.The description for the documentation requirements are available at the project 1 page.
